question: Tùi 2009 nî 12 goe̍h 31 ji̍t kàu 2010 nî 12 goe̍h 31 ji̍t, ūi-tiâu hō loan (chham-khó kûng-chiàⁿ) ê chóng thîng-tâi tōa siōng ê cheng-chha (kòe-chha) sī hō-siáⁿ lūi-hêng?
Tī 2010 nî 12 goe̍h 31 ji̍t, kám-chiáⁿ kah 'chi̍t kàu sù hō͘ jîn-chū chha-lí hō͘-chúi sán-seng ê siong-phín' liân-kiat ê Měi-kok chè-tōaⁿ lóng-chóng ūi-m̄-chiah?

Chiu chhut (bô pau hām lóng-chóng) êi chè-chok hāng-bo̍k, chiah-ê chè-chok tī 2010 nî ê USA í-gōa sī iân-tāi ióng-iú i ê 2010 lóng-chóng chè-chok ê siōng-koân pō·-hun. Chit ê te̍k-têng hāng-bo̍k tī 2009 nî ê lóng-chóng chè-chok sī siáⁿ-chē?
Chiu-siong chiah-lâi ê chóng iok-sok tùi 2009 nî nî-boé kàu 2010 nî nî-boé ê tsóng-thé kái-piàn sī án-tsuánn? Koh chí-chhut tòo ē liáu-kái tsit-ê kái-piàn ê nn̄g ê tōa lūi-pia̍h.
answer: Chiu-siong chiah-lâi ê chóng iok-sok kiám-kē $132,366 pah-bān, tùi 2009 nî ê $1,076,738 pah-bān kiám-kē kàu 2010 nî ê $944,372 pah-bān. Tsit-ê kám-kiám thàu-túi nn̄g ê lūi-pia̍h ê tōa kám-kiám hâm-tì: 'Sìn-ióng-kā séng-chhiúnn', kiám-kē $86,822 pah-bān, kah 'Siong-gia̍p kah kî-tā lūi siong-lí iok-sok', kiám-kē $46,938 pah-bān. Tsit nn̄g ê lūi-pia̍h tâng-tsuē chiàm pí tsuân-pòo ê chóng kiám-kiám ê lián-kiám pí tiâu.

question: Le̍k-chāi 2010 nî Bí-kok tòng-chè lōa-chē hāng tòng-chè ê châi-tiāu chhiau-kóe $100,000 pah-bān dólares, chiok chiáⁿ-chāi 2009 nî kap 2010 nî tiong-kan tòng-chè lâi kám-chiáⁿ ê hāng-mū chheng-tōaⁿ?
answer: Commercial and other consumer loan commitments

question: Tī 2010 nî 12 goe̍h 31 ji̍t ê chóng 'uāi-kok-lāi' tāi-khuán tang-tiong, 'sìn-iōng-kà sòaⁿ' chiàm tó-tōa-sò͘-pái ê toā-sò͘ sī kúi-á hūn?
Tī December 31, 2010, ài hō͘ 'commercial real estate construction and land development' ê chhiam-tó͘ tī Bí-kok cheng-ka 15% ê sî, Bí-kok ê chóng-kiōng chhiam-tó͘ ē chiâⁿ chòe kúi-bái?
Àn-chiàu 2010 ê sò͘-kù, chi̍t ê liāu-khuán ê siâⁿ-chhī-lāi (U.S.) tōa-chúi kah i tī chha-bkau-tōe (outside of U.S.) ê tōa-chúi sī ū tiāu-kiāⁿ ê koan-hē mah? Ì-suh ê lí-iû.
answer: Bô tiāu-kiāⁿ, chi̍t-ê ti̍t-chiap ê koan-hē. Chóng-sī ū siōng-kài siâⁿ-chhī-lāi tōa-chúi ê nn̄g ê chióng-lūi ('Credit card lines' kah 'Commercial and other consumer loan commitments') mā ū siōng-kài chha-bkau-tōe tōa-chúi, che ê hong-sò͘ bô thè só͘-ū chióng-lūi. Chhōe-chhiūⁿ, 'commercial and similar letters of credit' ū siōng-chió ê chi̍t-ê siâⁿ-chhī-lāi tōa-chúi ($1,544M) m̄-koh ū tē-saⁿ-tōa ê chha-bkau-tōe tōa-chúi ($7,430M), chiū-kóng chha-bkau ê hun-pò͘ sī chin chē-chē tòe tī chha-biat ê liāu-khuán lūi-hêng, bô àn-chiàu chi̍t-ê phó͘-thong ê chòan-sih.

question: Tae-pó͘ lāi-bīn ê siá-chòe ê lia̍p-chham ūi-tī só͘-ū sò͘-jī ê bûn-pêng lāi-bīn, chin bô hō͘-siong tû-chha, koh i ê pháiⁿ-thang sī siá-chòe?
answer: Só͘-ū ê sò͘-jī lia̍p-chham ( 'december 31 2010 u.s .', 'december 31 2010 outside of u.s .', 'december 31 2010 total', 'december 31 2009' ) lóng bô hō͘-siong tû-chha. I ê bô hō͘-siong tû-chha sī in-ūi ū chi̍t-kóa ê ì-sù ū chah chi̍t-ê '$' hō-chhoán kah chi̍t-ê khang-á (chhin-chhiūⁿ '$ 1544'), tān-sī chē-chē ê pa̍t-ê ì-sù tī kā chi̍t-ê lia̍p-chham lāi-bīn sī tōa-pō͘-hūn sī sûn-sò͘ (chhin-chhiūⁿ '2582'). Chit-ê bô kāng chióng ê chu-liāu ê chióng-lūi ē thang chō-chiâⁿ tē-chit ê chu-liāu hun-sek ê sit-gō.

question: Gim-mi̍h chhiúⁿ-chúi lūi-hêng ê choân-pō͘ 2010 nî jīm-bū, hām pa̍t-ê to̍k-li̍p lūi-hêng pí-kàu, sī chi̍t-ê chin tōa ê giâ-ke? Chhiáⁿ iōng tiong-ū-chit lâi chèng-bêng lí ê koan-tiám.
answer: "Sìn-iōng-kard hām chha̍t-chhia chhiúⁿ-chúi" sī chi̍t-ê chin tōa ê giâ-ke. Liáu 2010 nî, chhú-gōa 6 ê to̍k-li̍p lūi-hêng ê choân-pō͘ jīm-bū ê tiong-ū-chit sī 14,954 pah-bān bí-kim. "Sìn-iōng-kard hām chha̍t-chhia chhiúⁿ-chúi" ê choân-pō͘ sī 698,673 pah-bān bí-kim, tī-tī-á to̍k-chū tio̍h sī tiong-ū-chit ê 46 chá-poâⁿ, pí tòe-ê tōa-ê lūi-hêng (tī chi̍t-ê tōa-sè-chè ê bīn-chhián) pí i koh 3 chá-poâⁿ, chha-biat koh chin bêng-hián, chiâⁿ-chòe chi̍t-ê giâ-ke.

question: Tī 2010 nî, tùi kim-gî-sū kiàn-siat kah tē-bīn khai-hoat ê Bí-kok kah Bí-kok gōa ê pí-lu̍t sī siáⁿ-mih?
